episodes.name: Chapter 1: The Mandalorian
episodes.overview: A Mandalorian bounty hunter tracks a target for a well-paying client.

episodes.name: Chapter 2: The Child
episodes.overview: Target in-hand, The Mandalorian must now contend with scavengers.

episodes.name: Chapter 3: The Sin
episodes.overview: The battered Mandalorian returns to his client to collect the reward.

episodes.name: Chapter 4: Sanctuary
episodes.overview: The Mandalorian teams up with an ex-soldier to protect a village from raiders.

episodes.name: Chapter 5: The Gunslinger
episodes.overview: The Mandalorian helps a rookie bounty hunter who is in over his head.

episodes.name: Chapter 6: The Prisoner
episodes.overview: The Mandalorian joins a crew of mercenaries on a dangerous mission.

episodes.name: Chapter 7: The Reckoning
episodes.overview: An old rival extends an invitation for The Mandalorian to make peace.

episodes.name: Chapter 8: Redemption
episodes.overview: The Mandalorian comes face-to-face with an unexpected enemy.

episodes.name: Chapter 9: The Marshal
episodes.overview: The Mandalorian is drawn to the Outer Rim in search of others of his kind.

episodes.name: Chapter 10: The Passenger
episodes.overview: The Mandalorian must ferry a passenger with precious cargo on a risky journey.

episodes.name: Chapter 11: The Heiress
episodes.overview: The Mandalorian braves high seas and meets unexpected allies.

episodes.name: Chapter 12: The Siege
episodes.overview: The Mandalorian rejoins old allies for a new mission.

episodes.name: Chapter 13: The Jedi
episodes.overview: The Mandalorian journeys to a world ruled by a cruel magistrate who has made a powerful enemy.

episodes.name: Chapter 14: The Tragedy
episodes.overview: The Mandalorian and Child travel to an ancient site.

episodes.name: Chapter 15: The Believer
episodes.overview: To move against the Empire, the Mandalorian needs the help of an old enemy.

episodes.name: Chapter 16: The Rescue
episodes.overview: The Mandalorian and his allies attempt a daring rescue.

episodes.name: Chapter 17: The Apostate
episodes.overview:
The Mandalorian begins an important journey.

Note: Set after "The Book of Boba Fett" S01E05 to S01E07.

episodes.name: Chapter 18: The Mines of Mandalore
episodes.overview: The Mandalorian and Grogu explore the ruins of a destroyed planet.

episodes.name: Chapter 19: The Convert
episodes.overview: On Coruscant, former Imperials find amnesty in the New Republic.

episodes.name: Chapter 20: The Foundling
episodes.overview: Din Djarin returns to the hidden Mandalorian covert.

episodes.name: Chapter 21: The Pirate
episodes.overview: The people of Nevarro need protection from rampant pirate attacks.

episodes.name: Chapter 22: Guns for Hire
episodes.overview: The Mandalorian visits an opulent world.

episodes.name: Chapter 23: The Spies
episodes.overview: Survivors come out of hiding.

episodes.name: Chapter 24: The Return
episodes.overview: The Mandalorian and his allies confront their enemies.
